directions: Place beef, onion, bell pepper, garlic and cumin in a large, deep skillet. Cook over medium high heat until hamburger is evenly brown. Drain any excess fat.
Stir cheese, green chilies and tomato sauce into the beef mixture. Cook 5 minutes, or until cheese is melted.
Equally divide lettuce among salad plates. Pour meat and cheese mixture over lettuce and garnish with chopped tomato and corn chips.
ingredients: 1 pound processed cheese food (e.g. Velveeta), cubed
3/4 head iceberg lettuce - rinsed, dried, and shredded
title: Mom's Hot Mexican Salad
